General.Name: TerniEnergia S.p.A
General.Description: TerniEnergia S.p.A. develops and provides solutions and products based on digital and industrial technologies for the energy sector. The company offers RTu-Go, an equipment for the field's device management in the industrial, infrastructure, housing, and utilities markets; Adverto, a flexible system for HMI and process automation; energy and gas retail suite of products to manage the procurement and sale process of electricity and gas, such as billing, trading, and energy data management; and Teneo, an asset management solution for maintenance planning and management. It also provides Esos, a smart system for energy consumption optimization and analysis; and MP48 automation and process control equipment; Energy Data Manager, a solution for energy managers to control the expenditure and optimized management of electrical consumption and supply; Libra, a platform for flexible resource aggregation in the electricity market; and load shedding service that allows energy cost savings to customers, who are available to interrupt their power supply. In addition, the company produces energy from renewable sources, such as solar; and manages industrial fluid waste treatment plants and groundwater reclamation works. It serves large utilities, distributors and grid operators, power producers, public authorities, industrial customers, and investors. TerniEnergia S.p.A. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Narni, Italy.
